lead_paragraph: Looking to bolster its special teams, Seattle signed the free-agent wide receiver and kick returner Willie Ponder. Ponder spent the past three seasons with the Giants, playing in 26 games. He averaged 25.9 yards on kickoff returns last season after leading the league in 2004, averaging 26.9 yards a return.
